title: New: Jetpack Jones – Right Here (Prod. By Retral)
body: **[Jetpack Jones](http://www.facebook.com/JetpackJones)** (previously **[Venom](http://admin.crackintheroad.com/music/11033-new-venom-jupiter-or-mars-prod-by-handbook/ "New: VenoM – Jupiter or Mars (Prod. by Handbook)")**) has become my go to when it comes to inspiring and ‘feel-good’ hip-hip. At his best he’s boyishly confident and idealistic, at his worst, he sounds like your juvenile ex-boyfriend. To be honest, the latter still manages to come across as wonderfully charming. His new track, ‘Right Here’, comes with a wonderfully floaty central beat and a doctrine of life lessons; it just might get you out of bed tomorrow.
